Did you send pictures to Jeffrey Epstein while he was in jail? 19 20 A. No. 21 Q. Did you tell him you would send him pictures? 22 A. Yes. 23 Q. And did you sign your correspondence to Jeffrey Epstein, 24 "Best love always, Kate"? 25 A. Yes. SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300 DOJ-OGR-00018441
